titles.title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of kiwi fruit under the perishable product provisions of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act and the United States-Israel Free Trade Area arrangement.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, USDA, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Amends the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act to make kiwi fruit a "perishable product" with respect to petitions for import relief under the perishable product provisions of such Act. Amends the Trade and Tariff Act of 1984 to make similar changes with respect to such Act.
